priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire BPI Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C100162

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire BPI Test Code Terminology

name: Brief Pain Inventory Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire BPI Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Brief Pain Inventory Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Marital status.
Brief Pain Inventory - Education.
Brief Pain Inventory - Education. Professional degree.
Brief Pain Inventory - Current occupation.
Brief Pain Inventory - Spouse's occupation.
Brief Pain Inventory - Which of the following best describes your current job status?
Brief Pain Inventory - How long has it been since you first learned your diagnosis?
Brief Pain Inventory - Have you ever had pain due to your present disease?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Due to Present Disease

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - When you first received your diagnosis, was pain one of your symptoms?
Brief Pain Inventory - Have you had surgery in the past month?
Brief Pain Inventory - What kind of surgery have you had in the past month?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Kind of Surgery in Past Month
synonyms: BPI1-Kind of Surgery in Past Month

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Have you had pain other than these everyday kinds of pain during the last week?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Other than Everyday Kinds

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Did you take pain medications in the last 7 days?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Medications in the Last 7 Days
synonyms: BPI1-Pain Medications in the Last 7 Days

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - I feel I have some form of pain that requires medication each and every day.
Brief Pain Inventory - On the diagram, shade in the areas where you feel pain.
Brief Pain Inventory - On the diagram, put an X on the area that hurts the most.
Brief Pain Inventory - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its worst in the last week.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain at its Worst in Last Week
synonyms: BPI1-Pain at its Worst in Last Week

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its least in the last week.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain at its Least in Last Week
synonyms: BPI1-Pain at its Least in Last Week

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain on the average.
Brief Pain Inventory - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that tells how much pain you have right now.
Brief Pain Inventory - What kinds of things make your pain feel better?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Things that Make Pain Feel Better
synonyms: BPI1-Things that Make Pain Feel Better

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - What kinds of things make your pain feel worse?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Things that Make your Pain Worse
synonyms: BPI1-Things that Make your Pain Worse

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - What treatments or medications are you receiving for your pain?
Brief Pain Inventory - In the last week, how much relief have pain treatments or medications provided? Please circle the one percentage that most shows how much relief you have received.
Brief Pain Inventory - If you take pain medication, how many hours does it take before the pain returns?
Brief Pain Inventory - I believe my pain is due to the effects of treatment.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Due to Effects of Treatment
synonyms: BPI1-Pain Due to Effects of Treatment

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - I believe my pain is due to my primary disease.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Due to Primary Disease

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - I believe my pain is due to a medical condition unrelated to my primary disease.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Due to Unrelated Medical Condition
synonyms: BPI1-Pain Due to Unrelated Med Condition

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - I believe my pain is due to a medical condition unrelated to my primary disease. Please describe condition.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: aching.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: throbbing.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: shooting.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: stabbing.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: gnawing.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: sharp.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: tender.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: burning.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: exhausting.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: tiring.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: penetrating.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: nagging.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: numb.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: miserable.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: unbearable.
Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your general activity.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Interfered with General Activity

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your mood.
Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your walking ability.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Interfered with Walking Ability

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your normal work.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Interfered with Normal Work

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your relations with other people.
Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your sleep.
Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your enjoyment of life.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Pain Interfered with Enjoyment of Life

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - I prefer to take my pain medicine.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Prefer to Take Pain Medicine

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - I take my pain medicine (in a 24 hour period).
Brief Pain Inventory - Do you feel you need a stronger type of pain medication?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Need Stronger Type of Pain Medication
synonyms: BPI1-Need Stronger Type of Pain Med

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Do you feel you need to take more of the pain medication than your doctor has prescribed?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Need more Pain Medication than Prescribed
synonyms: BPI1-Need more Pain Med than Prescribed

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Are you concerned that you use too much pain medication?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Concerned with Too Much Pain Medication Use
synonyms: BPI1-Concerned Use Too Much Pain Med

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Are you concerned that you use too much pain medication? If Yes, why?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Why Concerned with Too Much Pain Medication Use
synonyms: BPI1-Why Concerned Use Too Much Pain Med

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Are you having problems with side effects from your pain medication?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Problems with Side Effects Pain Medication
synonyms: BPI1-Problems with Side Effects Pain Med

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Are you having problems with side effects from your pain medication? Which side effects?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - What Side Effects from Pain Medication
synonyms: BPI1-Which Side Effects from Pain Med

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Do you feel you need to receive further information about your pain medication?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Need Further Information about Pain Medication
synonyms: BPI1-Need Further Info about Pain Med

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: warm compresses.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Warm Compresses to Relieve Pain

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: cold compresses.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Cold Compresses to Relieve Pain

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: relaxation techniques.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: distraction.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: biofeedback.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: hypnosis.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: other.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Other Methods to Relieve Pain

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: other. Please specify.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Specified Other Method to Relieve Pain

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory - Medications not prescribed by my doctor that I take for pain are.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI - Medications not Prescribed Taken for Pain
synonyms: BPI1-Meds not Prescribed Taken for Pain
